website_summaries.verdict: A roomy tent with multiple entrances, bright colors, and indoor/outdoor versatility.
pros: Flexible, sturdy poles make it easy to set this reliable tent up inside or out
Comes with carrying bag for vacation use, too
Holds up to four young kids comfortably
Primary colors appeal to boys and girls
cons: Complaints are rare, but a few buyers say they received the product in a damaged package

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! A very spacious tent and well made. It had a bit of a smell when we first set it up from the tarp material on the bottom but that quickly dissipated by the next morning. My 7 year old loves it and was able to set it up almost entirely by himself (except for the second arch piece). An excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MommaCX3 ☀️❤️

customer_reviews.title: and they loved playing in it
customer_reviews.text: We set the tent up last weekend when two of our grandchildren (ages 4 and 20 months) were here, and they loved playing in it! I give it five stars because it's very easy to assemble, roomy, colorful, a great price, and seems to be of good quality. I like that the top is mesh so that air can move through more freely and light can come in. Something I didn't notice when I ordered it is that tent pegs also come with it in case anyone wants to set it up outside to keep it from blowing away. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: mtnvalleygirl

customer_reviews.title: A REAL review
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a cool tent! My nieces are 5 and 8 years old, and they love it! It goes together quickly and simply, which makes it better than some of the other play tents I have reviewed. It's also great when the kids are able to put it together because that means they're also able to take it apart and put it away when play time is over :P
customer_reviews.author: Policeman

customer_reviews.title: Once set up with super hero blankets and super hero pillows
customer_reviews.text: The closest to what I was looking for my almost 3 year old grandson. Once set up with super hero blankets and super hero pillows, I thought Perfect!. However, am a little concerned as an indoor pupose placed tent he may be able to topple over. So he'll need supervision until he gets older. Perhsps a teepee would have been a better choice for his age. Otherwise, love it and it's got a nice big size and generous entrances! He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Huge and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great size, extremely durable, at least indoors. My 3.5 year old twins boys and their 1.5 year old brother have put it through the ringer over the last 3 months, Including tipping it onto one side and thus creating a "rocket ship" and pulling the rods out of their seats and bunching the whole tent up to where they cross at the top to use the rods as "fishing poles". Definitely well made and durable. Only wish there was a way to attack the collapsible tunnels to the round openings. The size is right but there isn't a way yo hold them to the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Muhajiba

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the tent... The bags were worn with tears & one of the poles was broken. We couldn't even set it up. Extremely disappointed. I suspect we received someone else's return. I'll be returning it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: A BIG HIT WITH MY 3-YR-OLD GRANDSON.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for a growing active little boy. Don't we all remember our "forts" when we were kids? We'd put some kitchen chairs together and cover them with sheets and bedspreads and that was our fort. Now, kids can have a real tent with doors and windows and even a floor. This is light-weight, easy to assemble and take back down. Perfect for indoors or outside. And his 7-yr-old sister could fit in there with him and they had a great time at grandma's house.
customer_reviews.author: DobieOne

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with a big tear in it. I just don't have the heart to take it away from my nephew to at this point to send it back. We cannot get him out of it. I contacted Kiddey via email about the tear and replacement but they have not responded and I do not have a number to call. Bummer :(
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is great! We were on the fence for a long time for this tent. So glad we bought this one. My son is 7 years old, my other son is 1 year old, and they both fit inside perfectly. Myself 5’2 and my husband’s who is 5’10 also fit inside fine with the boys. Needless to say we do a lot of “camping” with our boys in our living room. It’s great. It has the straps for tunnels too, we are looking into purchasing those later.
customer_reviews.author: Gfd

customer_reviews.title: Very huge play tent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent for my 4 year old and 2 year old. They absolutely love it. It is very big and I'm in a small apartment but I have it in the living room so it fits well there. It wasn't that easy to set up for me but once you understand it it gets better. It is durable because my kids ran in and out of it for hours and almost toppled it over a few times and it's still standing. It's a good tent to keep the kids busy and entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kitties New Play Room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cats and they LOVE it. Although I had to have help put it together as it just wouldn't do as expected. All three of us tried as much as we could to make the poles bend over the top as needed. Eventually we decided they may have given us extra poles we didn't need. So we bent a pole attachment to the Red and the Yellow pole and then all of a sudden everything fit. If not for the hassle of of trying to get to work and needing help I would have given it 5 stars. In the end my two kittens love darting in and out of it with their toys.
customer_reviews.author: Gidget007

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Grandkids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the grandkids to sleep in while staying over the holidays. We put two kids air mattresses and sleeping bags inside for them to use. They loved that they could go in and out at will. They even crept in earlier than their normal bedtime. I think they liked the idea of being close to the family without being closed up in a bedroom. The setup was pretty easy. Just follow the instructions. I 've had dome tents for years for backpacking trips. Keep in mind, this is NOT a $200 backpacking tent. You have to be careful with the support rods.
customer_reviews.author: kcallahan47

customer_reviews.title: Love it, plan to purchase more!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tent for several months and LOVE IT! Was one of the birthday gifts for my two-year-old son and he has played in it and also taken great naps! It's definitely a great size, my husband and I can even fit in it with him! Its even easy to put together and take down. We have taken it back and forth to his grandparents several times! Once my family gets a larger living room or backyard space I definitely plan to buy additional pieces to go along with it. And it was so affordable. If you want something for your child and family I wouldn't hesitate!
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandchildren love the Kiddey play tent. All three boys, ages 4, 5, and 6, fit in it. When the youngest grandson takes a nap, we put a mattress in the tent and he sleeps so soundly. The tent is very sturdy and the material is holding up a lot better than another tent we had. I like the way the support rods are easy to bend so we can move the tent from room to room. The kids play for hours in it and their imagination has gone wild with all the things they pretend the tent is--a space ship, a cabin, a cave, etc. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: M. Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fort / Play Tent
customer_reviews.text: We bought this tent because our 3 year old wanted us to be IN her fort with her, and no other fort was this size. Now we can all laugh and play inside the fort together! It is super easy to put together, and fits her toddler crib mattress perfectly! She loves hanging out in it, reading books, playing games, and even napped in there! It has three entrances: one big one for adults, and 2 hole ones on the other sides of the tent. It has been set up in our living room since we purchased it! Great fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: My Kid Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy to store. We have used it for a few times only indoors so far due to covid 19 and we had so much fun. Imaginary play with kids is so much fun. So far no rips and no damage to the unit. I think its pretty durable since my 2 year old jumps and pulls on it. Cant complain for what I paid for. Customer service reached out to me to confirm if everything was okay with the product which I appreciate. Thanks again for some fun time!
customer_reviews.author: Vick

customer_reviews.title: Safety hazard ?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent for my grandson in February but did not try to set it up until today when it’s hot enough. It took my hubby and I to set it up. The sticks don’t look like they will stay in place if they are pulled intentionally. we are very worried that the sticks can snap and it will injure our grandson or us. Perhaps our 17 Months old grandson is too young for it. I like the one that we got from ikea so much better. We have missed the return window so unfortunately we are stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: DWEI

customer_reviews.title: Money wasted.
customer_reviews.text: So we had this in our playroom upstairs for a couple of months. After a couple of days of play by a toddler for about 2 months the pole broke and caused a hole in the lining. I had to throw it away. Now I’m searching for a better alternative. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia DeSio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent
customer_reviews.text: Ok so my oldest daughter got this for her bday in July and we love it. It was set up in our basement for about a month where they played and slept in it and it's very sturdy so far. She assembled and disassembled it all by herself. It was so great that we ordered a second one for our youngest daughter as well. We have had a few tents in the past few years and so far this one is our favorite. Will update when something breaks. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: yaderin

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money.
customer_reviews.text: Great little tent. My toddlers love it. We put it up a few days a month. We have had the tent for about three month and it seems like it's going to hold up for awhile. Now, we do encourage no rough housing in or around the tent. We have had up to 4 kids under the age of 6 playing on the tent at one time. The tent is large enough for two adults and two toddlers to seat comfortably. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: #BeHonest

customer_reviews.title: My kiddo loves this tent!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son's third birthday and he LOVES it! It was such a great buy! He likes to watch movies while he's sitting in there and he likes to play his game while he is in there. It is bigger than I thought it would be so I can fit in the tent as well when he asks me to come in. I think this is going to be even funner when we can set it up outside! I would definitely recommend and super easy to set up and tear down!
customer_reviews.author: Holly W.

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for two of my grandkids age 5 and 18 months. There’s plenty of room and it was easy to set up. It is light enough to blow away in a strong wind but it comes with stakes to prevent that. We haven’t tried to fold it up yet, but it looks like it would be fairly easy and compact for storage. There are two openings to crawl through plus the main entrance and all the flaps are held down or rolled up/back with Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Cadesy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this tent for our granddaughter who loves to be alone by herself and feel secluded. She had a smaller tent but it had been run through quite a few years before we finally were able to get rid of it. My husband decided to order this for her, and when it came quite a few of her dolls there Caravan campers and the like quickly followed her inside! That weekend, she had a sleepover so along with the Menagerie of toys inside, her friend stayed there and they slept in there overnight. Very very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Impressively good value
customer_reviews.text: It's very well designed and the quality is surprisingly high considering the reasonable price. It's plenty large for the kids to stretch out and they love all the doors and "windows". The top being clear mesh helps adults easily keep an eye on what's going on inside. It' really doesn't seem a toy, but instead a decent quality tent, sized for little people.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Sloane

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy and good height
customer_reviews.text: This tent is amazing. Bought it for one of my granddaughters for Christmas and she loves it. She’s almost 7 yrs old very tall and has more than enough room to play, read and entertain her sisters and cousin. Tent allows at least 3-4 kids in it and still a bit roomy. Very pleased with this purchase . Not your typical play tent , this is roomy and has a good height . If you’re looking to purchase a play tent I recommend 100% you purchase this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Sinisi

customer_reviews.title: Grandpa’s Surprise For Grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the play tent for when our grandchildren come to visit. It is absolutely perfect for a backyard camp out that will include roasting hot dog franks and marshmallows. I am impressed with the size of the tent and it’s lightweight but durable construction. Assembly was a snap. I look forward to many hours of backyard camping with our grandchildren. They’ll be here for a visit in a couple of days. The tent will be a surprise. They’re gonna love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait!
customer_reviews.text: The kids, ages 6 and soon to be 4 absolutely love it! I honestly thought it was going to be a tiny thing. NOT the case. I was happily surprised when I got it put together (in less than five minutes) and found they both fit with room to spare. I think I might buy one for their mommy’s house. Bonus, there is a bottom so it’s also perfect for outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is super easy to assemble. Less than 5 min from package to playtime. The top being mesh is a nice feature for indoor play, but wouldn’t be great for outdoor midday sun play. The interior is made of blue waterproof tarp. It seems fairly sturdy and is very roomy on the inside. I was able to fit inside (5’5/120 lbs) with my two kids (49” and 39” tall, with 4 throw pillows, one king side pillow and throw with a snug but not uncomfortable. Did have a bit of an odd smell inside for a little while.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: useless merchandise
customer_reviews.text: arrived without poles. replacement will arrive after my granchildren leave. sending a tent wthout part of what should be in the package is an unfogiveable oversight. ask my grandchildren to stop crying.
customer_reviews.author: Lya Auslaender

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my twins birthday, them and their older brother seem to really enjoy it. I put 400 of those plastic ball pit balls in it and the kids all fit while in there playing together. It's a bit annoying to put together, not confusing, just those dang sticks want to pop out. It's definitely manageable to do it alone though. The material is also pretty thin but I'm pretty certain it'll last more than long enough to get my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent for my preschool Sunday school class! They love love love it. It was easy to set up and has withstood 6-10 kids in and out of it. It stays up all the time but I figure the disassembly is as easy as the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany R.

customer_reviews.title: This is the coolest little people tent!
customer_reviews.text: I set this tent up in 3 minutes. It is just like a grown up tent and fits two adults and two kids, sitting down. Everything is sewn nicely and the poles are sturdy. My grandson's loved it and putting it back into it's case was just as easy as taking it out! I can't wait until warmer weather when we can put this outside!
customer_reviews.author: Shes A Kick

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for shelter in place
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase for indoor play during COVID-19 lockdown. My girls have set it up inside and outside. I had originally ordered it for my four year old to use at her sister’s softball games; to give her shade and entertain her. It will be great for that too! Well priced, durable and easy to assemble. Must have when you are going to be how many days!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for my kindergarten classroom!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent! It's set up in the corner of my classroom as I am using it to be a sensory/safe area for my kiddos to go if they get overstimulated. I have a huge beanbag, weighted blanket, and sensory objects all stored inside it and there's plenty of space!
customer_reviews.author: vtmom

customer_reviews.title: Camping at home!!
customer_reviews.text: Whenever my grandkids come to spend the night, my living room is transformed into a giant fort. Every chair, table, couch cushion and blanket that I own is all over the place! They came in last Friday and there was the tent in the middle of the room! They were so excited! We "camped out" at home! It was great! Even made s'mores!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne E. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Indoor “Camping”
customer_reviews.text: This took minutes to set up. Very fast and easy. My daughter loves it. My only thing is that it’s slightly smaller than advertised. Maybe by an inch? Either way, it works just fine. I don’t think it would hold up for regular outdoor use, especially if it rained (closures all all Velcro, not zippered). It’s perfect for our indoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: it keeps them busy playing for hours.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loves it. He was so happy to help me put it together and playing for hours in this great weather we are having. I'm so happy with the size for him even though he's a big 4 year old. He just loves it. The size is great and it's very sturdy and easy to put up and take down. We just love it.
customer_reviews.author: adriana p

customer_reviews.title: She loved it
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for an almost-2 year old, stole the show. She has been camping with her parents since a tiny baby, so she is used to tents. And was thrilled to get her very own. Not so sure the parents are thrilled to have it taking up their living room, but they are happy when she is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mavis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but big
customer_reviews.text: Great play tent. Your whole family can probably fit in this and it's well vented with a mesh ceiling and three entry ways. The downside is this tent takes up a of space if you set it up indoors. The inside floor is waterproof and not that comfortable to sit on so we use a blanket in there
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids loved this tent. It was an easy 2-minute setup. I love the mosquito netting at the top and wish it was over the windows too. Then it would be great for playing and sleeping outdoors. The ONLY reason for 4 starts.
customer_reviews.author: B. Leete

customer_reviews.title: great adventure item
customer_reviews.text: I am so very much impressed with the ease with which I assembled this. Easy easy easy. I like the mesh in the top which allows me to see what's going on without invasion of looking through the door. Also there are 3 openings on ground level. Super fun for my grandson. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Fun little play tent
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this play tent for my 5yo son. He had a smaller pop-up style play tent that got destroyed. I chose this one from reading other reviews and the price. This one does have poles; but, the instructions are very clear and it’s super easy to assemble. I had it ready For the kids in about 7 minutes. We keep it inside our pole barn for the kids to play. It is able to fit 3 - 4 kids comfortably. Also, our beagle thinks it is his new dog house. It is holding up well to my destructive boys, barn cats, and the beagle.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Buttry

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BUY.... DON'T THINK TWICE..JUST BUY.
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING....BOUGHT IT FOR MY TWO YR OLD TO PLAY WITH....I CAN'T EVEN BEGIN TO DESCRIBE HOW MUCH HE LOVES IT. ITS MADE WELL..STURDY...EASY TO ASSEMBLE...AND MOST OF ALL BIG ENOUGH FOR HIM AND HIS 2 OLDER BROTHERS TO COMFORTABLY PLAY IN THERE. EXCELLENT PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: Durable roomy play tent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to set up in the house intermittently for 1 and 3 year old boy play and it’s been a hit! Very easy to set up. Very roomy allowing for our family of 4 to comfortably sit in it at the same time. It’s been up for 3 weeks and despite hard rough play it’s still in like new condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and i’m 30 weeks pregnant with a toddler who was “helping” ! Really good size, i actually thought it was smaller than it is but fun tent with the door options. The bottom is thin (i think like most play tents) so adding some blankets made it cushy and nice
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ann

customer_reviews.title: Broke after second use.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my kids to take naps in so they had something fun while being stuck at home. However, today I was taking it down to clean (2nd time disassembling) and after pulling the rods out of the sleeves, I started to break down the blue rod and the elastic holding it together let loose. Then after using the stuff sack to put the tent away the zipper slid right off the bag. I was very happy with this product until today but these items were to new to break like this. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for cheap price. Great for imaginary adventures.
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this, and I can forsee that they'll enjoy this for a couple years. The only con is the material is very thin and there are some threads coming loose already. The openings of the tent fits with a kid's tunnel that we purchased from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Inspired Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little tent
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3yr old. I've had play tents before that were busted within a week This one seems different. The poles are sturdy and you put it together exactly like a big outdoor tent we have so it's has a lot more stability to it. Love that you can open a whole side.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ennocenti

customer_reviews.title: Terrific tent for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have been enjoying this tent now for a couple of weeks. It was pretty easy to set up, the room inside is suffice for my 5 and 7 year olds. It's exactly as described. We use it indoors and they enjoy having a small space to make secret plans, watch a couple of shows on an iPad, or just to relax. If you're looking for an indoor tent for your kids, I highly recommend purchasing this one!
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: Good play tent for a two year old
customer_reviews.text: Ok Mary, thank you for patience. Tent received quite quickly. Son stated it was very easy to assemble. Grandson overjoyed especially since dad could join him. Tent compacts into its own tote with extra pegs for outside tie-down. This one however will be used inside. Colorful with three velcroed openings. Top meshed so you can keep an eye on sleeping or quiet play. Parachute type material.
customer_reviews.author: Ss

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little tent is roomy, easy to get in and out of, top screen allows you to check on the kids while they are in the tent and has been great to break up the cabin fever around here after all this snow and cold weather has kept us indoors!!! The tent is well constructed and we look forward to using it on the deck and in the backyard when weather allows!!!
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: My kids literally destroyed this thing within a day. I can't return it because I bought it well before their birthday and the period of return passed a few days ago. Sucks.
customer_reviews.author: LIZ

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I had expected, and NOT pop-up!
customer_reviews.text: I guess I didn't read this well enough but was kinda expecting a smaller tent that was a popup style like the window shades for cars. One where we could grab it and collapse it for storage. This thing is basically a full-blown tent like you'd camp with complete with the pole assembly process which definitely doesn't collapse down without disassembling the whole thing. It works, but is a bit more work than expected. Good overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent to use inside for my grandson. He has a smaller tent at his own home and loves it so I decided to get one for my home since I have him 5 days a week. It has plenty of room for his chair, toy box, books, etc. I will put some padding down inside the tent because it will be in the basement playroom.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L. Heiser

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: It took me less than 10 minutes to set up. It appears to be very durable once you are inside the tent. My 6 year old grand daughter loves it. She is too tall to stand inside but there is plenty of room to sit, crawl in and out and play inside the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: The tent is exactly as describe. My seven year old loves lounging in his tent watching videos on his tablet. Individually dad and I can fit in too Also, the set up time and price can't be beat! Thanks for all the honest and helpful reviews!
customer_reviews.author: LADU

customer_reviews.title: Best tent ever!
customer_reviews.text: this is my daughter's third tent and I must say that this is the best tent I have ever purchased for her! It's roomy, comfortable, it was easy to assemble and we all can fit into it for a evening of fun. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Starlite

customer_reviews.title: No supportive rods
customer_reviews.text: No fixing rods at all...All the rods are missing...It was supposed to be a surprise gift to my daughter and it greatly disappointed us...
customer_reviews.author: Nirupama

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a few for Christmas gifts. Kiddos love them! Set up is simple and the tent is HUGE. 6 of kiddos sat in at the same time. It’s a fun addition to any playroom. Even adults can this tent as a place to read and relax. I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I like that the tent appears to be used for both indoors and outdoors (although I have not had a chance to try it outdoors yet). The bottom is like a tarp and it comes with hooks to put in the ground. The top is see through so you can keep an eye on kiddos, but may not be great for unexpected weather outdoors (only downside to it!). It is very easy to set up. I've never set up a tent before but I didn't need to use the instructions that were provided. It comes in a re-usable zip up bag for easy clean up. My kids love the multiple entrances and thoroughly enjoy playing in it together!
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: This tent is perfect. I bought it for the baby
customer_reviews.text: This tent is perfect. I bought it for the baby, but my older kids 9, 7 also love playing in it. One month in and still popular. They play in it almost every day. They enjoy the several ways to get in, it's light weight and I like that you can see in through the top. When it first arrived I did not like the strong plastic smell, but that's gone now.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great summer fun area
customer_reviews.text: Colorful and large, this tent fits 4 toddlers comfortably and has 2 round windows with roll up shades, and a door with Velcro closures. It stays cool because it has mesh net on the top for circulation. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Topteacher

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The tent poles broke after a little over a month. Thanks elastic pulled right through. This has only ever been set up/taken down by adults.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Missing rod bag
customer_reviews.text: Would give 5 stars but mine was missing the rod bag. Maybe in the grand scheme of things, I could probaly just use a plastic bag to store the rods but it's in the product details so it's annoying to not get something that was paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Ronicus Michaelatigus AllBulatigus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Backyard Fun, but Not for Rain
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assembly, spacious, well-ventilated, and sturdy (with stakes). Great for the backyard. Not for camping, and no protection from the rain because vented top is not covered. Easy to move too. Overall happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: YChilds

customer_reviews.title: Bigger area for children of all ages .
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 5 1/2 year old son with exceptional needs , it is his most wanted space . He loves being inside it . He even plays with his 10 year old sibling and also can accommodate adults . Nice private space and a bit warm in cold weather too . The waterproof feature is definitely a boon to us . Can be used in out door and indoor . I have given 4 stars since the poles have to be handled with care other than that it’s a wonderful lovely place for children of all ages and needs .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, well-designed tent for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great indoor tent for our 5 year old and 8 year old granddaughters. They love their private shelter and have great fun scampering in and out of the three different side openings. It's roomy enough for up to 4 kids to play inside or for 2 kids to sleep comfortably. Assembly is quick and simple. Not sure how long it will stand up to rough and tumble play, but so far it seems reasonably sturdy. Good price for a colorful, medium-sized kids' tent.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for preschool child.
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my four year old grandson. We ended putting it in his bed and he naps and sleeps in it when he stays over at Grandma's house. It's great quality and easy to set up. We'll take it outside when the weather is better.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda French

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Set Up
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice size tent. I was able to place a turtle sandbox inside and still have room for the kids to play. Would have preferred a zipper front closure, but the velcro is strong and well-spaced. Airy mesh at top which I can cover when bad weather is upon us. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Swant

customer_reviews.title: Great play tent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our granddaughters 1 & 3 years old to use at our house. Didn't realize they have the exact same one at home. Great tent, easy to assemble and quick to take down. Like that it has multiple entrances and see through top. Great size, not sure about durability because only one use.
customer_reviews.author: C. lauer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is much bigger than I anticipated, which is great, because we have 4 grandchildren under 3, and they play like a litter of puppies, so the extra room is perfect. Very happy with the size, quality, and ease of assembly. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great kids tent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for indoor use for 3 great grandchildren, age 3, 21/2, and 1/12. They had a ball!! Plenty of room to stand and play. I laid heavy duty throw rugs on the vynol tent floor to keep it in place. Worked perfectly. Totally satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Marty L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor use
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! My only complaint is that it says indoor/ outdoor and even comes with stakes, however none of the doors/flaps seal and there is no cover for the mesh top. This is really only suitable for indoor use for this reason unless you are just playing with it outside and not intending to use in inclement weather or for sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Melt88

customer_reviews.title: Easily to assemble, but the poles are not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My kids used this couple of times and they liked it so much, but the poles are not that sturdy and now one of the pole is broken, which makes the tent is not usable anymore. I was trying to find a replacement poles but looks like hard to find that information.
customer_reviews.author: W3n0d

customer_reviews.title: Great little tent
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 7 year old grandson. He loves it - as well as his cousins. They had a great time playing in it on Easter. He will also be using it on two upcoming camping trips. This product seemed much sturdier than other play tents I've seen in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: This tent made a big hit with my 4-year old grandson on his recent birthday. He and his 6-year old brother have already spent the night in it (in their sleeping bags in their own room). It is sturdy and easy to set up, and should provide years if great play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this tent!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this tent! I purchased it as a gift for my 5 year old. I have an 11 month old that loves it as well. Easy to assemble & the sturdiness surpassed my expectations to be honest. It’s large, but not TOO large. It could easily fit 4 kids of my sons size inside comfortably. I had a play tunnel for my baby already and it fit this tent perfectly. All in all I’m very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a four year old who wanted to go camping. She loves it! Now she can go camping inside or outside. Large and roomy enough for at least 3 or 4 kindergarten age children. Quality materials and super easy assembly. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: suckerforakid

customer_reviews.title: This is nice and big but the first day I arrange the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and big but the first day I arrange the elastic broke.I hate to return to the garbage went.
customer_reviews.author: angela perez

customer_reviews.title: Easily set up. Only 3 pieces. Since the cross bars are connected.
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely what I was looking for. Just right for my 5&7 year old grandchildren. Fits in the family room for movie time fun and pretend camping. I will probably buy a second one to send home with them
customer_reviews.author: jpgr1961

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it. My little apartment, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool tent. Put it up in the winter when we were locked in from Covid-19. My little boy loves all the different ways you can get inside the tent. We created a comfortable environment inside and would always hang out. It is a bit big, read the dimensions. Don't know about using it outside, although I'm sure its fine. Awesome for creative play and to change up the mood.
customer_reviews.author: mikhail kneller

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves the tent he wants to bring it in the house so he can nap in it! The only downside is it doesn't have a fly cover so when we left it outside and it rained it got full of water.
customer_reviews.author: Zarhard

customer_reviews.title: Great for our Family Trip
customer_reviews.text: We used this on our family trip for our son on top of his bed (just barely fits on top of a queen). I thought it would make staying at a different hotel each night a little less unsettling. I think it helped for my 4 and a half year old so he could go to sleep a little quicker, easier. We will use it again.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I gave only 4 stars because the top is net. If it rains at all the kids will get wet in this tent. We use it as a play tent outside in the summer and it would be nice if they could sit in it while it rains but they cannot due to the net top. Otherwise, the tent is awesome and a lot of fun for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I have ordered.. first one was for grandchildren and used inside my home when they visited.. lasted A LONG TIME. Second one was for their children, my great grandkids, in my home and I’m sure it will be just as sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: MAM

customer_reviews.title: Play tent
customer_reviews.text: I cannot address the quality and durability of the play tent, because it is a gift. I can tell you this seller has made this one of the most pleasant transactions ever. If the tent has the quality and durability other reviewers have approved of, then this is a good / fair priced play tent.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: My kids love using this
customer_reviews.text: My kids love using this. It's fairly easy to put up and take down and can be done within minutes. I also like how it folds up neatly for easy storage. We haven't used it outdoors yet, so I can't comment on how it will hold up outside, but it's been working out perfectly as an indoor play area. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: very well made and durable. it is a lot bigger than i was expecting. my twin 4 yr olds and 2 yr old have plenty of room when all three are in there. (as seen in picture). very very easy to set up. took me probable 5 min. to set up completely.
customer_reviews.author: a.Wassily

customer_reviews.title: Very good distraction for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is worth the value! My kids love to play it it. The entrances are closed by velcro, so I dont recommend to use outside is you are in a area with a lot of animals. Overall it's well done and very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: ROBERTA R L SILVA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pretend camping in the basement
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves it! He used it for the first time in his birthday party at home with some friends. Then he decided that he would like to pretend going camping in the basement (his playroom) with some of his stuffed animals. He has "slept over" in the basement several times so far. It's very easy to set up, and the colors are nice.
customer_reviews.author: B Loyola

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Tent for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Tent for kids. All of their friends fit in the tent with enough room for more (thats 4 kids in there). It is a pretty big tent, and I like the netting on top so when it's in doors I place it under the fan. You can also place a small fan in one of the opening so air is flowing when the little one goes to sleep. I have not used it outside but with the trap like material I think it will do great outside. FYI it can hold adults as well :)
customer_reviews.author: TGill

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble/great buy
customer_reviews.text: it is perfect for my son and at least one of his friends to hang out in it. he keeps it in his room to watch tv or in the living room to play video games. i put i blanket over the top of it for it to be dark inside. it was pretty easy to assemble. great buy. perfect for little ones to play in.
customer_reviews.author: Mika C

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tent. I’ve had it in my quiet area in my PreK classroom for over a month. It’s sturdy. I Just pick it up & move it around so the custodian can clean.
customer_reviews.author: Peia Edgerly

customer_reviews.title: EASY SET UP!
customer_reviews.text: Ok... Even I could set this tent up! That’s the first great thing! Hope my three grands, 6, 5,and 3 will have fun!
customer_reviews.author: jeri hoopes

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve made for my kids.
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best thing I’ve ever purchased for my kids. We put sleeping bags and flashlights in their tent and they play for hours. It is so fun for them. And the imaginative play they come up with is incredible to witness. OH! and it packs up super small so we even will throw it in a suitcase to bring on vacation. My kids are obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M. Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Kids like it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the tent and play in it everyday. It was easy to assemble and took me less then five minutes. We use it for indoor play. I like that it's colorful and has three different opening to get in the tent. overall happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nanz

customer_reviews.title: My grandson LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my five-year old grandson for his birthday. He lives an hour away so I didn't know how big of a hit it was. My son said that he had been in the tent most of the time since it was put up that evening and he was enjoying it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: T. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this tent for a "bring your tent to camp" day and loved it! It's easy to assemble, colorful, and my daughter loves it! So much so we put it in her bedroom and she's been sleeping in it ever since we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Very good and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old and he loves it. It's bigger than I thought but it's perfect for him and two other toddler to play with him and lay down in.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tent
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I envisioned for my 16 month old grandson’s gift We had so much fun reading books and crawling in and out of the door and windows. My puppies loved it too. Can’t wait for his next visit.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

product_meta.title: Kiddey Kids Play Tent & Playhouse – Indoor/Outdoor Camping Tent for Boys and Girls – Promotes Early Learning, Social Bonding, Imagination Building and Roleplay – Easy Setup
feature_bullets: ★★ INSPIRE FUN, CREATIVE PLAY ★★ – The Kiddey Kids Play Tent & Playhouse spurs creativity and imagination in kids of all ages, helping build critical thinking skills, independence, confidence and social bonding with friends and family.

★★ EASY SETUP & STORAGE ★★ – Each kid’s tent sets up quickly and easily thanks to flexible tent poles and in-ground stakes that keep it in place. Better yet, it comes with a convenient carry bag to store it away when you’re done.

★★ LARGE SIZE, MULTIPLE ENTRANCES ★★ – Unlike other playhouses that only have a front door, ours features a Velcro front door and two “tunnel” windows; both with roll-down flaps for easy access. Your kids can walk or crawl in easily!

★★ HOME, CAMPING OR PARKS ★★ – Each tent comes with a convenient carry bag which makes it easy to use at home or for on-the-go play. The bottom is also waterproof and the sides water-repellant, making it safe for indoor/outdoor use.

★★ GREAT FOR BOYS & GIRLS ★★ – Perfect for ages 3 and up, our play tent is fun for families with young boys and girls, preschool and elementary school teachers, and early educators who want to help kids grow, learn and have a great time.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,324 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
